summary: REQ-1 appears to be implemented via mobile-first layout/typography/spacing adjustments in BenefitsSection.tsx, including a 2-column mobile grid and preserved md/lg breakpoints. Two additional files were modified that were not requested in the BuildRequest.

hallucinated_features.description: Modified project tracking/state file (project_state.json), including adding/altering new_feature_requests entries (AR-1/AR-2) and statuses.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only asked for frontend layout changes to BenefitsSection.tsx and did not request changes to project metadata/state tracking files.
BuildRequest did not request documentation/summary updates; it only requested UI/layout changes in BenefitsSection.tsx.
